hooks.command: filepath="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [ -n "$filepath" ] && [ -f "$filepath" ]; then case "$filepath" in *.py) ~/.local/bin/black "$filepath" 2>/dev/null && ~/.local/bin/isort "$filepath" 2>/dev/null ;; *.js|*.ts|*.vue) cd "$(dirname "$filepath")" && npx prettier --write "$filepath" 2>/dev/null ;; esac; fi; true
